name: Yallaiah Onteru
title: Software Engineer
professional_summary: Utilized Java and J2EE technologies to develop scalable enterprise applications, focusing on Spring Framework and Hibernate for ORM, ensuring efficient data management and application performance.
Engineered RESTful and SOAP web services using JAX-WS and JAX-RS, integrating with external systems for seamless data exchange in a healthcare insurance platform.
Implemented microservices architecture with Spring Boot, improving system modularity and scalability for a banking application, reducing deployment time by streamlining services.
Configured and deployed applications on Apache Tomcat and JBoss servers, ensuring high availability and performance for mission-critical systems in the insurance domain.
Developed JSP and Servlets for dynamic web pages, enhancing user interaction and experience in a healthcare claims processing portal, adhering to HIPAA compliance standards.
Integrated EJBs for complex business logic, optimizing transaction management and ensuring data integrity in a financial services application.
Applied JDBC and Hibernate for database connectivity, streamlining data access and reducing redundancy in a customer relationship management system for the banking sector.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to troubleshoot and debug Java applications, resolving critical issues and improving system stability in a healthcare data analytics platform.
Implemented enterprise integration patterns using Apache Camel, facilitating smooth data flow between disparate systems in an insurance claims processing pipeline.
Utilized Maven and Jenkins for build automation and CI/CD pipelines, ensuring consistent and reliable deployments in a cloud-native banking application.
Developed and maintained unit tests using JUnit, ensuring code quality and reliability in a healthcare provider network management system.
Worked with Docker and Kubernetes to containerize and orchestrate Java applications, enhancing deployment efficiency and scalability in a cloud-based insurance platform.
Implemented security best practices using Spring Security, safeguarding sensitive data in a financial transaction processing system, adhering to PCI DSS standards.
Optimized database queries and schema design using SQL and Oracle, improving data retrieval speeds in a healthcare patient records management system.
Participated in code reviews and pair programming sessions, fostering knowledge sharing and improving code quality in a collaborative team environment.
Mentored junior developers in Java and J2EE best practices, accelerating their onboarding and productivity in a fast-paced consulting project.
Adapted to evolving project requirements, learning new technologies and frameworks to deliver innovative solutions in the healthcare and insurance domains.
Documented technical specifications and user manuals, ensuring clear communication and knowledge transfer for future maintenance and enhancements.
